root.name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Triple Trouble
root.description: Sonic the Hedgehog: Triple Trouble was developed by Aspect and published by Sega for the GameGear. It was originally released in 1994. It is the sequel to Sonic Chaos.The game allows you to play as either Sonic or Tails, each with a unique ability. Each of the six zones consist of three acts: Great Turquoise, Sunset Park, Meta Junglira, Robotnik Winter, and Atomic Destroyer. The duo must battle Knuckles the Echidna, Dr. Robotnik, and new villain Nack the Weasel (called Fang the Sniper in the Japanese version).Aside from the classic fast-paced sonic action, a few stand out sequences include riding a snowboard down a slope ando tails piloting a submarine.
